Title: Wolverine
Actors: Rikiya Koyama, Vic Mignogna, Milo Ventimiglia, Romi Pak
Plot: Logan is asked by his old friend, a cop from Japan, to help him take down Shingen Yashida's crime syndicate and save Mariko, Logan's lost love, from forced marriage arranged by her father Shingen. Yukio, a female assassin, helps him.
